Structure.style: STRMATCHRE(req1.attributeValue("Status"),"(?i:Approved)") IF FALSE : "NOK style" ELSE: "Without format but centered"

$SOME(ent3) IF TRUE: {STRCNT(ent3.attributeValue("Test Result")) IF 0 : "NOK style" ELSE :{"NA" $< (ent3.attributes[STRMATCHRE(typeName,"(?i:result)")][TRUE].ident) IF TRUE : "NOK style" ELSE : "Without format but centered";}} ELSE : "NOK style"
STRMATCHRE(req1.attributeValue("Status"),"(?i:Approved)") IF FALSE : "NOK style" ELSE: "Without format but centered"

STRCNT(req1.attributeValue("Implemented")) IF 0 : {$SOME(ent1) IF TRUE: {STRCNT(ent1.attributeValue("Implemented")) IF 0 : "NOK style" ELSE :{"false" $< STRLOWER(ent1.attributes[STRMATCHRE(typeName,"(?i:Implemented)")].ident) IF TRUE : "NOK style" ELSE : "Without format but centered";}} ELSE : "NOK style"} ELSE :{"false" $< STRLOWER(req1.attributes[STRMATCHRE(typeName,"(?i:Implemented)")].ident) IF TRUE : "NOK style" ELSE : "Without format but centered";}

STRMATCHRE(req1.attributeValue("Status"),"(?i:Approved)") IF FALSE : "NOK style" ELSE: "Without format but centered"

STRCNT(req1.attributeValue("Implemented")) IF 0 : {$SOME(ent1) IF TRUE: {STRCNT(ent1.attributeValue("Implemented")) IF 0 : "NOK style" ELSE :{"false" $< STRLOWER(ent1.attributes[STRMATCHRE(typeName,"(?i:Implemented)")].ident) IF TRUE : "NOK style" ELSE : "Without format but centered";}} ELSE : "NOK style"} ELSE :{"false" $< STRLOWER(req1.attributes[STRMATCHRE(typeName,"(?i:Implemented)")].ident) IF TRUE : "NOK style" ELSE : "Without format but centered";}
